user.title: Welcome to SimpleChores
user.description:
Hi there! Thank you for checking out SimpleChores.

Click the 'Next' button to continue setting up the integration.

point_system.title: Points System
point_system.description: Would you like to enable a points system for tracking household contributions?

points_label.title: Points Label
points_label.description: How would you like to call your points? (e.g., Points, Stars, Credits)

n_members.title: Household Members
n_members.description: How many members are in your household and will be tracking chores? (You can add more members later if needed.)

member_names.title: Member Names
member_names.description: Enter the name for member {member_number} of {total_members}.

update_points.name: Update member points
update_points.description: Add or subtract points from a member's counters

offset.name: Points offset
offset.description: Number of points to add (positive) or subtract (negative)

periods.name: Periods
periods.description: Which period counters to update (defaults to all)

reset_points.name: Reset member points
reset_points.description: Reset a member's point counters to zero

periods.name: Periods
periods.description: Which period counters to reset (defaults to all)

init.title: SimpleChores Management
init.description: Choose what you want to manage.

manage_members.title: Member Management
manage_members.description: Choose an action to manage household members.

manage_chores.title: Chore Management
manage_chores.description: Choose an action to manage household chores.

add_member.title: Add New Member
add_member.description: Add a new household member to track chores and points.

edit_member.title: Select Member to Edit
edit_member.description: Choose which member you want to edit.

edit_member_details.title: Edit Member: {member_name}
edit_member_details.description: Update the member's name or manage their points.

data_description.points_offset: Add (positive) or subtract (negative) points from all counters

delete_member.title: Delete Member
delete_member.description: Select a member to permanently delete. This will remove all their data and entities.

delete_member_reassign.title: Delete Member: {member_name}
delete_member_reassign.description: This member has assigned chores. Select another member to take over their chores and be added to the possible assignees list.

data_description.reassign_to: Select which member should take over the chores

add_chore.title: Add New Chore - Basic Information
add_chore.description: Create a new household chore to track.

data_description.points: How many points are earned for completing this chore
data_description.area_id: Which area of your home is this chore for?

add_chore_assignees.title: Add New Chore - Assignment
add_chore_assignees.description: Configure who can do this chore and how it should be assigned.

data_description.assignees: Select which members can be assigned this chore
data_description.assignment_mode: How should this chore be assigned to members?

add_chore_recurrence.title: Add New Chore - Recurrence Pattern
add_chore_recurrence.description: How often should this chore recur?

add_chore_interval.title: Add New Chore - Recurrence Interval
add_chore_interval.description: Configure the interval for this chore's recurrence.

data_description.recurrence_interval: Chore will recur every X days

add_chore_monthly_day.title: Add New Chore - Monthly (Day)
add_chore_monthly_day.description: On which day of the month should this chore recur?

data_description.recurrence_day_of_month: Day number (1-31, or -1 for last day of month)

add_chore_monthly_weekday.title: Add New Chore - Monthly (Weekday)
add_chore_monthly_weekday.description: On which week and weekday should this chore recur?

data_description.recurrence_week_of_month: Which week (first, second, third, fourth, or last)

add_chore_specific_days.title: Add New Chore - Specific Weekdays
add_chore_specific_days.description: On which days of the week should this chore recur?

data_description.recurrence_specific_weekdays: Select one or more days of the week

add_chore_annual.title: Add New Chore - Annual Recurrence
add_chore_annual.description: On which date should this chore recur annually?

delete_chore.title: Delete Chore
delete_chore.description: Select a chore to permanently delete.

error.member_exists: A member with this name already exists
error.chore_exists: A chore with this name already exists
error.no_members: No members exist. Please add members first.
error.cannot_delete_last_member: Cannot delete the last member. At least one member must remain.
error.not_implemented: This feature is not yet implemented

errors.single_instance_allowed: Only one instance of SimpleChores is allowed.
